creator: Timosha Chervyachkov
descriptionHtml:

Gain new powers by passing more and more levels

title: Elemental Gloves

creator: MOONEE PUBLISHING LTD
descriptionHtml:
Enjoying superpower abilities in magic games? Crazy about first-person games? Elemental Gloves – Magic Power is a casual game where you fight with enemies using the super power in your magic gloves. Have you ever dreamed of being an elemental master controlling the magic of various elements?

The gameplay in this power game is easy to learn. Just use two thumbs to activate your hero's magic hands. The controls are simple, but the enemies are much more difficult than you think! Take the chance to practice real elements magic and turn the bad guys into the stone or glass.

Furthermore, this game has elements of shooting. Shoot with fire, splash with water or simply hit the enemies. Combine the elements in the gloves to create new super power. For example, try to merge lightning and air to turn the bad guys into balloons.

Why you’ll love this element game:
- A lot of skins. Upgrade your gloves to the more powerful ones. Get game coins and unlock random gloves of selected element.
- Various locations. Defeat the enemies and complete the levels to open new areas. Would you like practicing magic among palm trees?
- Different gloves. Choose the magic for each hand. You have a big choice between common and super power. What combination will be more effective against enemies?

Download Elemental Gloves – Magic Power and gain super power abilities. Become an elemental master with the most powerful magic hands in super power games.
descriptionShort: Use superpower in your magic hands. Defeat the enemies in a fun elemental game.

Why you’ll love this element game:
- A lot of skins. Upgrade your gloves to the more powerful ones. Get game coins and unlock random gloves of selected element.
- Various locations. Defeat the enemies and complete the levels to open new areas. Would you like practicing magic among palm trees?
- Different gloves. Choose the magic for each hand. You have a big choice between common and super power. What combination will be more effective against enemies?

Download Elemental Gloves – Magic Power and gain super power abilities. Become an elemental master with the most powerful magic hands in super power games.
descriptionShort: Use superpower in your magic hands. Defeat the enemies in a fun elemental game.
